item.title: Creative phase II - Minimal
item.description: There have been some creative vibes in November 2020 which led to fiddling around with Affinity Designer and the Apple Pencil. Post 2/2. Toying around with Affinity Designer led to various other results. Ensō The hand-drawn Zen circle Ensō symbolizing absolute enlightenment. Mountains Triangle mountains.

item.title: Creative phase I - Cinelli
item.description: There have been some creative vibes in November 2020 which led to fiddling around with Affinity Designer and the Apple Pencil. Post 1/2. As mentioned here, after a lifelong wait from April to November ‘20, there’s a new bike in town. I’m so in love that I started toying around with the iPad, Pencil & Affinity Designer which led to the images below. Cinelli Logo Hand crafted Logo as a puzzle piece for Nemo’s down tube.
